Welcome to Delving

Strategic network partner & custom solution provider
for the cultural-heritage sector

Strategic Network Partner

Profit from our widespread involvement in the cultural-heritage sector. We have both leading and contributing roles in various national and european projects and can open doors.

Custom Solution Provider

Our core business is building stuff - usefull stuff, cool stuff! We build tools to help you get the most out of your data and to share it online with the rest of the world.

Open Source

We build open-source tools to help tackle the challenges which many cultural heritage institutions face. Our tools are built with interoperability and best practices in mind.

Source code for many of our tools is available here: https://github.com/delving
